DOC.brief_title: Oral Health Individuals Who Attended Mother-child Dental Care Program - Longitudinal Study
DOC.detailed_description: The aim longitudinal study assess oral health individual attend mother-child dental care program ( PPPWB ) . Letters send 343 child examine phase 1 . One hundred thirty nine individual return oral examination - experimental group ( 40.5 % ) . The control group consist 139 individual receive dental care PPPWB . These individual pair experimental group accord age socio-demographic characteristic . Gingival bleeding ( GBI ) DMFT index use order determine child 's oral health status .
